channel.title: Drops File Location
channel.description: hey guys i just downloaded the Project RS remake source a 317 a few days ago and canot find the file where to edit drops.... It is not in the data folder unless it is NPCConstants.TSM but when i open it is is just numbers in no organized fashion just sort of typed in. Guide me to where the location of the folder is... ive been looking for like an hour and am lost :P

item.title: Drops File Location
item.dc:creator: @modzilla modzilla
item.description:
@modzilla wrote:

Nvm… its in the dang config.java file…

/* NPC/ID/AMOUNT/POSSIBILITY */ // Men {1,526,1,0}, {2,526,1,0}, {3,526,1,0}, // skeletons {92, 526, 1, 0}, // Al-Kharid warrior {18, 526, 1, 0}, {18, 995, 2000 + Misc.random(10000), 5}, // Mugger {175,526,1,0}, // Guards {9,526,1,0}, // Skeletal Wyverns {3068, 4832, 1, 0}, {3068, 4087, 1, 40}, {3068, 3140, 1, 40}, {3068, 1187, 1, 40}, // Ice Queen {795, 6585, 1, 50}, {795, 4832, 1, 0}, {795, 555, 200 + Misc.random(150), 10}, {795, 560, 150 + Misc.random(100), 10}, {795, 565, 100 + Misc.random(100), 10}, {795, 392, 25 + Misc.random(25), 10}, {795, 386, 30 + Misc.random(30), 10}, {795, 6731, 1, 40}, {795, 2

Ive never heard of that oh well… thanks for your help. For some reason if i post my problems i end up finding the solution…

item.title: Drops File Location
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“modzilla, post:3, topic:478511”]I dont appreciate the remark. I am used to coding 572s and a 317 is way different. The npcs in the Source dont drop anything so there is nothing to search. I know how to use the search bar. When i search NPC drop or drops or anything related it comes up with nothing. Coming to the forum is a last resort… Trust me im not a huge fan of the community here. Large in part of people like you… Facts :/[/quote]it should be in a file called npcdrops.cfg
in the config folda

Read full topic

item.title: Drops File Location
item.dc:creator: @modzilla modzilla
item.description:
@modzilla wrote:

I dont appreciate the remark. I am used to coding 572s and a 317 is way different. The npcs in the Source dont drop anything so there is nothing to search. I know how to use the search bar. When i search NPC drop or drops or anything related it comes up with nothing. Coming to the forum is a last resort… Trust me im not a huge fan of the community here.

I will have you know that i figured out the problem with the file.
It is completely dis organized and the name is completely misleading. If anyoine stumbles upon this post pm me and ill help ya out in re organizing the file for drops on the same server.

Read full topic
